Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class Pipeline

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.Pipeline
public final class Pipeline extends Object
Updates a group of GameSystems as a unit.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pipeline

      public Pipeline(GameSystem... systems)
      Constructs a new pipeline running systems.

  • Method Details

    • withFrequency

      public Pipeline withFrequency(int frequency)
      Returns a pipeline that runs this pipeline's systems with target frequency. The returned pipeline ensures that its systems update at a constant frequency times per second.

    • update

      public void update(long dt)
      Updates this pipeline by dt elapsed ns.

    • attach

      public void attach(EntityPool entities, PerfMonitor perfMonitor)
      Attaches resources to this group.

    • getSystems

      public Collection<GameSystem> getSystems()
      Returns this group's systems.
